Name: David O. Russell
Bio: David Owen Russell is an American film writer, director, and producer.

Name: Richard Curtis
Bio: Richard Whalley Anthony Curtis is a British screenwriter, producer, and film director, primarily known for the romantic comedy films Four Weddings and a Funeral, Notting Hill, and Love Actually.

Name: Thea Sharrock
Bio: Thea Sharrock is an English film and theatre director and writer, known for Me Before You, The Hollow Crown, and The One and Only Ivan.

Name: Jennifer Kaytin Robinson
Bio: Jennifer Kaytin Robinson is an American screenwriter, producer, and film director.

Name: Jon M. Chu
Bio: Johathan Murray Chu is an American director and screenwriter. He is best known for directing Crazy Rich Asians, the first film by a major Hollywood studio to feature a majority cast of Asian descent in a modern setting since The Joy Luck Club in 1993.

Name: John Whitesell
Bio: John Whitesell is an American television and film director.

Name: Paul Feig
Bio: Paul Samuel Feig is an American actor and filmmaker, known for directing Bridesmaids, The Heat, and A Simple Favor.

Name: Hernan Jimenez
Bio: Hernan Jimenez is a Costa Rican film director, screenwriter, actor, and stand-up comedian.
